title: E68 A Lazy River Cellar and a Buffett Tattoo
description: Get on board with the theybies! It’s episode 68. Em covers the (redundant) Barnstable House in MA and Christine covers the disappearance of OSU med student Brian Shaffer in 2006. And that’s why we drink. Go Bucks!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
